document_name: National Strategy for Reducing the Risk of Catastrophes
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/TGO/2013/TGO-2013-12-25-National Strategy for Reducing the Risk of Catastrophes_40ace4193bd6c7b2e4bdc92d34cb1c9f.pdf
document_description: This Strategy aims at reducing disaster risks by defining and promoting solutions tailored to the country's context. It notably seeks to mainstream adaptation efforts into sectoral policies. The document specifies that local environmental risks amplified by climate change include violent winds. It states that all levels of threats related to climate change should be dealt by the government.
